alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 10:41PM MDT until June 20 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... West central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 1115 PM MDT. * At 1041 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of O`Neil Pass to 5 miles west of Roubaix Lake to near Mystic, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Roubaix Lake around 1045 PM MDT. Silver City, Brownsville, Cheyenne Crossing, Roughlock Falls, Pactola Reservoir and Iron Creek Lake around 1050 PM MDT. Terry Peak and Savoy around 1055 PM MDT. Nemo, Central City, Galena and Bridal Veil Falls around 1100 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Lead, Deadwood, Apple Springs, Dalton Lake and Spearfish Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
